QuestData.Title: WANTED: Quartermaster Ssylis
QuestData.Description:
Don't venture too far into the bay if you're not looking for a fight!
A couple of Bilge Rats have taken up residence in a nearby cave, and they won't stand down from any challenge.
They ain't harming anybody, 'long as you stay away. But if somebody wants to go take care of their leader, they will be rewarded.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The saurok in charge. Not a small threat by any sense of the word.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Quartermaster Ssylis in Krakenbane Cove.
QuestData.RewardText:
Aye, you got the saurok.
Bilge Rats should be out of here soon enough.
